FuncDef:
The trust 8021p-protocol command sets a BAS interface to trust the 802.1p priority of VLAN packets.
The undo trust 8021p-protocol command sets a BAS interface not to trust the 802.1p priority of VLAN packets.
By default, a BAS interface not to trust the 802.1p priority of VLAN packets.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If a QoS policy needs to be applied to VLAN packets that are delivered from the user side, the trust 8021p-protocol command can be used to encapsulate the PPPOE packets or IPOE packets carrying the 802.1p priority of VLAN packets.
Prerequisites
A BAS interface from which Layer 2 common users get online has been configured.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
